column1: Namrole Airport (Indonesian: Bandar Udara Namlea) (IATA: NRE
column2: ICAO: WAPG) is an airport on Buru island
column3: which is one of the Maluku Islands in Indonesia. There are regular scheduled flights by Aviastar and Trigana Air Service to Ambon from this airport. The airport has one runway with an asphalt surface measuring 1
column5: 070 ft) in length. The Airport is operated and managed by Government. Address: Lektama
column6: Namrole South Buru Regency Maluku Indonesia
